title: Case-Based Reasoning Learning Design for Unstructured Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge of social studies curriculum and experience in teacher professional development
context.additional_context: Digital collaboration learning environment to strengthen pre-service teachers' capacity to solve complex social issues encountered in real educational settings

learning_goals: Learners can analyze unstructured social problems and derive solutions using case-based reasoning
Learners can improve problem-solving processes by integrating diverse perspectives through collaboration with peers
Learners can effectively navigate and utilize a digital case library to propose contextually relevant educational solutions

resources: Collaboration Tools (Online Whiteboard, Document Sharing System)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
